issue.title: [C++] Mixed support for binary types in ASCII string functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14151](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14151). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add binary type support for ASCII string kernels.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14151?focusedCommentId=17429070) by Eduardo Ponce (edponce):*
ASCII kernels should not support binary types directly.
